message: The grant will help human services and the Colorado Department of Public Safety to develop a joint, comprehensive strategy to battle human trafficking in the state, according to the Department of Human Services.

data.description: A $1.4 million grant, funded by the U.S. Department of Justice, has been awarded to the Colorado Department of Human Services to combat human trafficking and to provide services to victims.
data.title: State gets $1.4 million fed grant to help combat human trafficking
